performance_units.title: Prepare to Install Electrical Wiring Systems and Equipment

learning_outcomes.description: Be able to check for damage and suitability of tools and equipment before use

assessment_criteria.description: Check that tools and equipment are suitable for the task.
Check that tools and equipment are not damaged.

learning_outcomes.description: Be able to prepare work areas for electrical installations

assessment_criteria.description: Clear the work area of obstructions before commencing work.
Ensure work area is prepared for safe electrical installation.

performance_units.title: Install Electrical Wiring Systems and Equipment

learning_outcomes.description: Be able to install electrical wiring systems

assessment_criteria.description: Install wiring systems in accordance with design specifications.
Comply with health and safety regulations while installing wiring.

learning_outcomes.description: Be able to install electrical equipment

assessment_criteria.description: Install electrical equipment in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Confirm the correct installation of electrical equipment with tests.

performance_units.title: Inspect, Test, and Commission Electrical Systems

learning_outcomes.description: Be able to inspect electrical systems and equipment

assessment_criteria.description: Perform visual inspection of installed systems.
Document inspection findings in accordance with regulatory requirements.

learning_outcomes.description: Be able to test electrical systems and equipment

assessment_criteria.description: Carry out continuity tests on electrical systems.
Conduct insulation resistance tests.

learning_outcomes.description: Be able to diagnose faults in electrical systems

assessment_criteria.description: Identify common electrical faults in systems and equipment.
Use diagnostic tools and methods to pinpoint electrical faults.

learning_outcomes.description: Be able to correct faults in electrical systems

assessment_criteria.description: Carry out repairs or replacements of faulty electrical components.
Confirm that faults have been corrected through appropriate testing.

performance_units.title: Plan and Prepare to Install Electrical Systems

learning_outcomes.description: Be able to plan for electrical installations

assessment_criteria.description: Interpret technical drawings and specifications for electrical installations.
Select appropriate materials and equipment based on installation requirements.

learning_outcomes.description: Be able to prepare the work area for installation

assessment_criteria.description: Ensure work area is safe and free from hazards.
Lay out materials and equipment in a logical manner to facilitate efficient installation.

learning_outcomes.description: Be able to perform visual inspection of electrical installations

assessment_criteria.description: Inspect electrical systems to ensure compliance with BS 7671.
Identify and document any non-compliant or unsafe installations.

learning_outcomes.description: Be able to perform electrical tests on installations

assessment_criteria.description: Carry out dead and live testing on electrical installations.
Document test results according to industry standards.

performance_units.title: Apply Health and Safety in Electrotechnical Environments

learning_outcomes.description: Understand and apply health and safety regulations

assessment_criteria.description: Identify and comply with relevant health and safety legislation.
Ensure safe working practices are implemented in the work environment.

learning_outcomes.description: Be able to assess and minimize risks

assessment_criteria.description: Carry out risk assessments for electrotechnical work.
Apply control measures to reduce or eliminate identified risks.

performance_units.title: Understanding Environmental Legislation and Sustainable Practices

learning_outcomes.description: Be able to apply environmental and sustainability regulations

assessment_criteria.description: Identify the key principles of environmental legislation.
Ensure sustainable practices are followed in all electrical work.
